thread.title: Priyanka Chopra to return to India next week for 'Bajirao Mastani'
thread.title_full: Priyanka Chopra to return to India next week for 'Bajirao Mastani' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Priyanka Chopra to return to India next week for 'Bajirao Mastani'
text:
Bollywood actress Priyanka Chopra , who is busy filming her maiden American TV series "Quantico" in Los Angeles, will return to the country next week to shoot filmmaker Sanjay Leela Bhansali's "Bajirao Mastani".
The 33-year-old actress has received almost positive reviews from TV critics and fans for her role of a young FBI ... Â»
